name: Cats and Mice
overview: In this game created by Maurie Yanney and published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1993/01, you're a mouse in this fast-paced one player game and you must maneuver through various mazes to reach a number of cheeses. To add a little excitement to the game, the cheeses also move! And to dial things up even further, several cats are chasing you! the object of the tame is simple to each all the cheese while avoiding the cats.
